ai:a.c: Performs the native action of the object.
Compiles the current script statement and saves it as byte code.
ai:a.p: ERR acSaveToObject(*Object, OBJECTID Dest, CLASSID ClassID)

ai:i.c: Refers to an object that will receive the encoded data.
Can refer to a sub-class that should be used when encoding the data.

ai:m.p: ERR sc::ClearBreakpoint(OBJECTPTR Object, CSTRING File, INT Line)

ai:i.c: The name of the script file (optional, can be empty).
The line number to set the breakpoint at (0-based).

ai:m.c: Adds a breakpoint at the specified line in the script.
ai:m.p: ERR sc::SetBreakpoint(OBJECTPTR Object, CSTRING File, INT Line)

ai:i.c: The name of the script file (optional, can be empty).
The line number to set the breakpoint at (0-based).

ai:m.c: Steps the script forward by one line when paused at a breakpoint.

ai:f.c: Returns a string array of all named procedures defined by a script.
